tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE packaging_materials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  carbon_footprint DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_processes (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name VARCHAR(255),
  emissions_factor DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE production_facilities (
  facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE packaging_products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  material_id INT,
  process_id INT,
  facility_id INT,
  production_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES packaging_materials(material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES manufacturing_processes(process_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES production_facilities(facility_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Packaging_Production (
  production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_id INT NOT NULL,
  material_id INT NOT NULL,
  production_date DATE NOT NULL,
  production_quantity INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES Packaging_Companies(company_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Packaging_Materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Packaging_Statistics (
  statistic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  production_id INT NOT NULL,
  emission_amount FLOAT NOT NULL,
  measurement_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (production_id) REFERENCES Packaging_Production(production_id)
);
